## Matrix3x3.setRowXYZ() method

Set values to a row in the matrix.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setRowXYZ(row: number, x: number, y: number, z: number): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  row | number | The row index |
|  x | number | The first value of the row to be set |
|  y | number | The second value of the row to be set |
|  z | number | The third value of the row to be set |

**Returns:**

this

- self
